document_data.name: Gloomfrost
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Gloomfrost''' was a large cavern in [[Icewind Dale]], situated somewhere far to the northeast beyond the [[Reghed Glacier]].

Many monsters laired here and ice tunnels that connected to it were infested by [[remorhaz]]es.

The Gloomfrost was also home to an elderly prophet who called herself the [[Gloomfrost Seer]] and a blind [[dwarf|dwarven]] smith named [[Tiernon Denthelm]] of [[Clan Hearthstone]].
